T02msitvatu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
T02msitvatu:2: śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe tatrāyuṣmān rāhulo 'tīva viheṭhyate /
T02msitvatu:3: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair anyaiś ca manuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ satvaiḥ /
T02msitvatu:4: athāyuṣmān rāhulo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ purato rudann aśrūṇi pravartayati sma /
T02msitvatu:5: atha bhagavān jānann eva rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
T02msitvatu:6: kiṃ tvaṃ rāhula mama prataḥ sthitvā aśrūṇi pravartayasi /
T02msitvatu:7: evam ukte āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02msitvatu:8: ihāhaṃ bhagavan rājagṛhe viharāmi śītavane mahāśmaśāne iṅghikāyatanapratyuddeśe (Mś_2) so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tatra viheṭhye /
T02msitvatu:9: devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahair marutagrahair asuragrahair kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair gandharvagrahair mahoragagrahair manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahair pretagrahair bhūtagrahair piśācagrahair kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair anyaiś ca manuṣyāmanuṣyaiḥ satvaiḥ //
T02msitvatu:10: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
T02msitvatu:11: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ rāhula imāṃ mahāśītavatī nāma dhāraṇīṃ vidyāṃ /
T02msitvatu:12: catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ ca dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya bhaviṣyati //
T02msitvatu:30: cili cili hili hili sumati vasumati /
T02msitvatu:36: hārīṭaki hārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki kārīṭaki /
T02msitvatu:81: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu jīvantu varṣaśataṃ paśyantu śaradāṃ śataṃ //
T02msitvatu:90: huru huru phuru phuru cara (Mś_4) cara khara khara khuru khuru mati mati bhūmicaṇḍe /
T02msitvatu:99: cara nāḍi culu nāḍi culu nāḍi vāgbandhani /
T02msitvatu:113: curu curu phuru phuru rundha rundha dhare dhare vidhare vidhare viṣkambhani /
T02msitvatu:127: huru huru khuru khuru piṅgale namo 'stu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ svāhā //
T02msitvatu:128: asyāṃ khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīvidyāyāṃ daśottarapadaśatāyāṃ sūtre granthiṃ baddhvā hastena dhāryamānāyāṃ kaṇṭhena dhāryamānāyāṃ samantād yojanaśatasya rakṣākṛtā bhaviṣyati (Mś_5) /
T02msitvatu:129: gandhair vā puṣpair vā mudrābhir vā naiva manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vābhibhaviṣyati /
T02msitvatu:130: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ na rogo na jvaro na prajvaro na vidyāmantro na vetāḍaḥ /
T02msitvatu:131: na vyādhinā nāgninā na viṣodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati /
T02msitvatu:132: vidyāmantraprayogānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhuprayuktānāṃ cāsiddhānāṃ siddhakarī /
T02msitvatu:138: yo graho na muñcet saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrdhā arjakasyeva mañjarī /
T02msitvatu:139: vajrapāṇiś cāsya mahāyakṣasenāpatir vajreṇādīptena prajvālitena ekajvālībhūtena tāvad vyāyacched yāvan mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayet /
T02msitvatu:140: catvāraś ca mahārājāno 'yomayena cakreṇa mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayeyuḥ /
T02msitvatu:141: kṣuradhārāprahāreṇa vināśayeyus tasmāc ca yakṣalokācyavanaṃ bhaveyuḥ /
T02msitvatu:143: atha khalu punā rāhula mahāśītavatīmahāvidyāyāṃ sakṛtparivartitāyāṃ rājacaurodakāgniviṣaśastrāṭavīkāntāramadhyagataḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimucyate /
T02msitvatu:144: iyaṃ khalu punar mahāśītavatī vidyā (Mś_6) ekanavatyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamair buddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitā bhāṣiṣyate bhāṣyate ca siddhā paramasiddhā siddhaparākramā /
T02msitvatu:146: sarvabhayopadraveṣu mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kuru /
T02msitvatu:147: śivam ārogyam abhayaṃ ca sarvadā sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvāvasthāsu bhavantu //
T02msitvatu:148: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān rāhulaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
